name: The Academy of Aviation (Pty) Ltd
about: The Academy of Aviation, with over 20 years of experience, is a premier flight training institution along the East Coast, offering commercial pilot programs and private pilot lessons. We have six locations and a commitment to a hands-on approach to student success. Our programs include career training, private pilot certification, and instrument rating, all designed to meet the highest aviation standards. We welcome domestic and international students, providing a supportive and tight-knit community. Our career pilot programs are developed in collaboration with airline and charter industry partners, ensuring graduates are well-prepared for professional aviation careers. We offer flexible scheduling and financing options, making aviation training accessible and comprehensive. At the Academy of Aviation, we are dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals with expertise and excellence.
services: ["Cabin Crew License\nCabin Type Rating\nRPC - Instructor Rating"]
